name: Thunder Wolf
description: A swift predator that runs with lightning speed through mountain trails.
unlockDescription: Complete a 30+ minute run burning 400+ calories
lore: Thunder Wolves are known to inhabit high-altitude regions where storms are frequent.

name: Flame Phoenix
description: A majestic bird of fire that rises from intense training sessions.
lore: Only the most dedicated athletes can summon this legendary creature.

name: Aqua Serpent
description: A graceful water creature that emerges during swimming sessions.
unlockDescription: Complete a swimming workout burning 200+ calories
lore: Found in all major bodies of water
column16: this creature loves to accompany swimmers.

name: Golden Dragon
description: The ultimate prize for elite athletes who push beyond their limits.
unlockDescription: Complete an epic 90+ minute session burning 1000+ calories
lore: Legends speak of this dragon appearing only to those who achieve greatness.

name: Forest Spirit
description: A gentle creature that appears during peaceful nature walks.
unlockDescription: Complete a 45+ minute hike burning 250+ calories
lore: These spirits guide hikers through ancient forests and mountain paths.

name: Iron Titan
description: A powerful being forged in the fires of intense strength training.
unlockDescription: Complete a 50+ minute fitness workout burning 500+ calories
lore: Born from determination and perseverance in the weight room.

name: Wind Falcon
description: A swift bird that soars alongside cyclists on their journeys.
unlockDescription: Complete a 25+ minute cycling ride burning 300+ calories

name: Crystal Guardian
description: A mystical protector that appears after sustained cardiovascular excellence.
lore: Guards the realm between mortal endurance and superhuman achievement.

name: Shadow Panther
description: A stealthy predator that appears during night runs.
unlockDescription: Complete a 35+ minute run burning 450+ calories
column16: only visible to those who dare run at night.

name: Boulder Bear
description: A sturdy companion for those who enjoy mountain hiking.
unlockDescription: Complete a 60+ minute hike burning 300+ calories
lore: These gentle giants roam mountain trails and protect hikers from harm.
